name: Diapers
description: The family has two children aged three and nine years old. Father incurred debt as a self-employed driver as he was unable to earn as much as he should be and was unemployed for a few months. The family incurred further debt as they had to borrow to meet their living expenses. As mother is a homemaker and on LTVP, she is unable to contribute to the family's finances. The couple feels stressed over their tight finances and will greatly appreciate diapers for their younger son.

description: Client is married with 2 young children (F/1, M/0) and the family of 4 is living together in a 2 room rental flat. For the child's safety, the family would like a sofa bed so that the child can sleep on the sofa bed without the parents having to worry about the child's safety. Parents are extremely hardworking and both have recently found full-time jobs and is working hard to support the family but have yet to receive their salary and are struggling financially at present.
